prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Bass, Drums, Guitar, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1: Reed, Bass, Drums, and Guitar are the instruments featured in this song, but Piano is absent.

Style 2: This composition is comprised of Reed, Bass, Drums, and Guitar, but Piano is not included.

Style 3: This piece is performed with Reed, Bass, Drums, and Guitar, but Piano is not part of the arrangement.
